property.name: doslocos.training.database.username
property.description: its database username that you must add in your sql

property.name: doslocos.training.database.password
property.description: its database password you must change it for connection to database

property.name: doslocos.training.database.schema
property.description: its the name of your database in the sql

property.name: doslocos.frequency.threshould
property.description: its the frequency that divided nodes as common nodes and unique nodes
